definition: divine strategy and wonderful planning (idiom)/clever scheme/supremely clever in his schemes
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: Then how in the name of all that is wonderful did you get these facts?
sentences.chinese: 可是你是怎么神机妙算地推测出这些事实的？

sentences.english: He admired the old man for his crafty plan.
sentences.chinese: 他敬佩老者的神机妙算。

sentences.english: Mr Tourre was responsible for the CDO, known as ABACUS.
sentences.chinese: 以神机妙算而闻名的图雷先生对于CDO负有责任。

sentences.english: Small section vertical and horizontal, God Machine Miaosuan.

definition: to prophesy with supernatural accuracy (idiom)/to have an incredible foresight
to lead military operations with extraordinary skill
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
lit. to devise battle plan in a tent (idiom)/fig. planning strategies
predictable/sth one can predict without being a clairvoyant
a general planning in the seclusion of his tent is able to determine the outcome of the distant battle (idiom)
pinyin: yun4 chou2 wei2 wo4 zhi1 zhong1 , jue2 sheng4 qian1 li3 zhi1 wai4
related.word: 运筹帷幄之中，决胜千里之外

definition: deceitful in many ways (idiom); wily and mischievous/full of craft and cunning
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
